title: Can't install remix-ide using npm install
body:
node -v:` v10.16.0`
This is the error I get:

```
ERROR: "build" exited with 1.
npm ERR! code ELIFECYCLE
npm ERR! errno 1
npm ERR! remix-ide@0.9.4 prepublish: `mkdirp build; npm-run-all -ls downloadsolc_root build`
npm ERR! Exit status 1
npm ERR! 
npm ERR! Failed at the remix-ide@0.9.4 prepublish script.
npm ERR! This is probably not a problem with npm. There is likely additional logging output above.

npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in:
npm ERR!     /home/user/.npm/_logs/2020-02-24T10_31_22_630Z-debug.log

```

could you run it in verbose mode?
In the meantime, please have a look to https://github.com/ethereum/remix-desktop/releases

...

if `npm install` works now, I think we can close this issue.
@ottpeter did you solve that issue ? e`rror: Cannot find module '/home/user/Remix/src/index.js' from '/home/user/Remix'` ?
ok. closing. please reopen if you still have problems
